channel.title: Hardware Assembly :: Zymbit Workshop
channel.description: Assembling the hardware Luckily, there isn’t much for us to do here (especially since we aren’t using the CR1025 battery), but there is some. Unpack everything We can take all the components out of their boxes, bags, etc. to start with. We won’t need the packaging again, so you can throw it away unless you want to reuse it. Install the Zymkey The only assembly we need to do is to install the Zymkey on the Raspberry Pi.
